name: Marchioness Chronicle
description:
Marchioness Chronicle is a short RPG about a lowly noble's daughter and her maid. The game is so short that I wasn't able to include any RPG elements into the game.
X - Attack
A - Jump
Right Shoulder Button -> Dodge
Hold Right Shoulder Button -> Run
Dodge + X -> Counter Attack
Run + X -> Running Attack

I can't get the keyboard to work so for now it's gamepad/joystick only
